title: Security Privileges - Accounts
body:
This article will explain what each setting in Security Privileges Accounts does and how it impacts the wider MediRecords environment. 
  Expense: Allows access to logging your expenses against outgoing payments 
GL Account : 
Accounting Transaction :
Journal Entry: Allows access to a log of all the changes around finance within MediRecords 
Schedule Assignment: Who can assign a schedule to other users for billing 
  Security Privileges - Clinical
Security Privileges - Billing
Security Privileges - Appointments
